Texts.Eng: According to the Central Circuit Database, my Broken Prod is actually a prototype weapon designed by NivRAM himself! The blueprints for the weapon are still available, but I need a ^orange;Circuit Data Drive ^white;to download it all. Once I have the drive, I should ^green;return to this terminal to start the download^white;.
The download is complete! Now I can start rebuilding the weapon.
